## FiletreeBuilderOptions.path property

Path adapter for path operations (required).

**Signature:**

```typescript
path: PathAdapter;
```

## Remarks

Provides path manipulation utilities like join, resolve, and basename. Use the adapter from `@boba-cli/machine`<!-- -->.
